Posts.Content: I just had a 12 core biopsy which revealed two cores with a G6 and a G7 respectively. My uro. recommends treatment, not just AS. I am going to Sloan Kettering in NYC for a second opinion. I am exploring options and favoring focal laser therapy as the least invasive option. I joined this forum to educate myself and learn from the group experiences. Thank you
Posts.Title: PCa diagnosis.
